message:
Hi {{ doc.reporting_manager_name }},

This is a friendly reminder to complete the required activities in your Reporting Manager Checklist. These activities are important for ensuring a smooth onboarding process for your team members.

Checklist Details:

  • Activity: {{ doc.activity_name }}
  • Deadline: {{ doc.deadline }}
  • Status: {{ doc.status }}

We kindly request that you complete the activity by the provided deadline to help us move forward with the onboarding process.

Thank you for your cooperation!

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Reporting Manger Checklist
subject: Reminder: Complete Your Reporting Manger Activity
